Name: Modding API
Author: Damocles
Description: A modding API that assists the creation of mods for Blasphemous 1

Name: Randomizer
Author: Damocles
Description: An item, enemy, and door randomizer

Name: Rando Map
Author: Damocles
Description: An in-game map tracker for the Blasphemous Randomizer

Name: Multiworld
Author: Damocles && TRPG
Description: A multiworld client that allows the randomizer to connect to Archipelago

Name: PrieWarp
Author: BadMagic
Description: A mod which allows easily warping between unlocked Prie Dieus with mnemonic hotkeys.

Name: Multiplayer
Author: Damocles
Description: A multiplayer mod that allows you to play Blasphemous cooperatively or against other people

Name: Boots of Pleading
Author: Damocles && Kein
Description: Adds a new relic called the 'Boots of Pleading' that allows you to survive falling in spikes

Name: Double Jump
Author: Damocles
Description: Adds a new relic called the 'Purified Hand of the Nun' that allows you to double jump

Name: Random Prayer
Author: Damocles
Description: Adds a new penitence that randomizes which prayer is used each time you attempt to cast one

Name: Debug Mod
Author: Damocles
Description: Enables the hitbox viewer and other features useful for testing and development

Name: OHKO
Author: Damocles
Description: Makes any source of damage instantly kill the player

Name: Andalusian
Author: Damocles, LuceScarlet, && SteveBass7
Description: Adds the Andalusian language to Blasphemous

Name: Iter Tormenti
Author: Neon Pixels
Description: A mod that adds options to experience all available content in a single playthrough

Name: Item Framework
Author: Damocles
Description: Framework that allows other mods to implement custom items

Name: Penitence Framework
Author: Damocles
Description: Framework that allows other mods to implement custom penitences

Name: Level Framework
Author: Damocles
Description: Framework that allows other mods to implement level modifications

Name: Custom Skins
Author: Damocles
Description: Allows using custom player skins made by the community

Name: UI Framework
Author: Damocles
Description: Framework that allows other mods to easily create UI
